#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{

    map<string,int> a;
    map<int,string> b;

    int t,i;

    cin>>t;

    for(i=1;i<=t+1;i++)
    b[i]="\0";

    while(t--)
    {

        string name;

        cin>>name;

        a[name]=a[name]+1;

        if(b[a[name]]=="\0")
        {

           b[a[name]]=name;

           cout<<a[name]<<" "<<name<<endl;

        }


    }

    return 0;

}
